text:
@ProfKarolSikora The test cannot distinguish between 6 types of Coronavirus...
Including 4 types of common cold !!!
The French Doctor needs to read the Lancet...or WHO publications even!
The test is flawed and unreliable 👇
"Immunity passports" in the context of COVID-19 https://t.co/WN3CvVMRFm

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
